name: GET_ModifyLaunchTemplate
description: Modifies a launch template. You can specify which version of the launch template to set as the default version. When launching an instance, the default version applies when a launch template version is not specified.

DryRun.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request, and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation. Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

ClientToken.description:
Unique, case-sensitive identifier you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. For more information, see Ensuring idempotency.

Constraint: Maximum 128 ASCII characters.

LaunchTemplateId.description:
The ID of the launch template.

You must specify either the LaunchTemplateId or the LaunchTemplateName, but not both.

LaunchTemplateName.description:
The name of the launch template.

You must specify either the LaunchTemplateName or the LaunchTemplateId, but not both.

SetDefaultVersion.description: The version number of the launch template to set as the default version.
